title: AGC - Ranked Team Recruitment
body:
Hello everyone! 

My name is Huskey, a staff member and ranked team coordinator for the gaming community AGC. Ranked teams in AGC play regularly with their ability to schedule practice sessions with their very own private text/voice channels and the option to scrim in-house against our other teams either in the same division or above for a real test of skill and co-ordination. If improvement is what you're after, in a competitive team environment, we also offer higher ELO coaches who can give you tips on your game. We are currently on the lookout to recruit players specifically for our ranked teams, solo, duo or even an entire five man, it doesn't matter. Just head on over to the google doc and fill out the signup sheet!

https://discord.gg/k5twXBA come and say hi.

replies.body: Very cool, I'll get my mates involved. Do you offer the same service for lower elos too? This sort of seems like a higher elo thing to me.

Great question, Legit A Korean. We currently offer ranked team support for all elos and coaching for anyone below Diamond. If you know of any masters+ coaches get them involved too so we can expand even further!
Thanks so much for the quick reply! Sounds like a great thing to be involved in!

This program seems fun to join but I'm worried if there's an age limit to this?

The age limit for membership with AGC is 16 years. AGC is a community that caters to 16-25 year olds, we don't regulate language or conversation topic unless it's something that is deeply offensive for a majority. Kind of means that anything goes here, as such we don't encourage the recruitment of members below 16 years.

Hopefully that clarifies things.
